name: codebase-analyzer-mcp
description: Multi-layer codebase analysis with Gemini AI. MCP server + Claude plugin with progressive disclosure.

scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:bin
scripts.build:js: bun build src/mcp/server.ts --outfile dist/mcp/server.js --target node && bun build src/cli/index.ts --outfile dist/cli/index.js --target node && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/cli/index.js > /tmp/cba.js && mv /tmp/cba.js dist/cli/index.js
scripts.build:bin:all: bun run build:bin:macos && bun run build:bin:linux && bun run build:bin:windows
scripts.build:bin:macos: bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/cba-macos-arm64 && bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile dist/cba-macos-x64
scripts.build:bin:linux: bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/cba-linux-x64 && bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile dist/cba-linux-arm64
scripts.release: npm version patch && bun run version:sync
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && bun run version:sync
scripts.release:major: npm version major && bun run version:sync
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run version:sync && bun run build:js

author: Jake Correa
